comment: Been watching your videos on the gen chem playlist and it has helped me a lot. Thank you so much!
I'm reviewing for my final exam in chemistry and your videos are so helpful! Thank you!
An absolutely phenomenal lecture with a very positive approach to teaching.  A must watch to reinforce knowledge.
Thank you so much for these videos!
Thank you so much sir I'm from India your videos help me so much.

Wanted to tell you how much I appreciate this playlist. I am 36 and going to college late, but I am going to try to get my bachelor's degree in plant biology or ecology. I am so worried that I am not smart enough to learn all this, wish me luck lol. Your videos are very helpful I appreciate you! thank you!
Awesome! Good luck in your final!
Glad you found us, tiana ! Good luck with all your studies.
